EmailTemplate.name: Approval Form Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Getting Ready to Launch!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your launch approval! We are excited to get your website live soon. Here is what to expect:
Launch Process: The website launch process will take up to 1 business day. We will email you once the website is live.
Platform Access: We will be providing you with access to the Luxury Presence Platform where you will be able to make edits to the website once the website is live.
We will let you know once the website is launched!
Best,
Self Serve Property Websites Luxury Presence Phone: (310) 955-1077 Email: support@luxurypresence.com
